item.description:
Tempt us with your favorite Spanish wine - Bring your favorite fondue dipper and let us celebrate "Cooler Tempertures" ( keep your finger crossed:-) Ralph is our very own "Ambassador of Great Wine" He throws a party to be remembered "COME ONE COME ALL"

We will have two Fondue stations Cheese - Chocolate

For cheese here are dipper suggestions

  • Fresh sausages such as lamb, beef, chicken and pork, broiled or sautéed and cut into bite-size pieces
  • Small Red Bliss potatoes, boiled
  • French bread, cut into chunks
  • Drained  vegetables
  • Whole small radishes
  • Or your favorite dipper

 

  For Chocolate here are dipper suggestions

:Fruit such as Stawberrys - bananas cut

:Pound cake cut into cubes

:Shortbread cookie sticks

:Pretzel Rods

:Or your favorite dipper

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine or 1.75MLs please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvre or desert. Please indicate what food item you want to bring when you sign up. If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more ( 750 ml) with your dish. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $30 or more depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste. Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing.

 

Reds - Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir.

 

Whites - sav blanc, chards, reisling, pinot grigio, etc

Please Bring Your Own Glass
item.how_to_find_us: We will E-mail the address out closer to the party

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Fondue & Spanish Wine "EXTRAVAGANZA"
